description: An hpicfSensorTrap indicates that there has been a
change of state on one of the sensors in this
chassis. The hpicfSensorStatus indicates the new
status value for the changed sensor.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HP-ICF-CHASSIS::hpicfSensorTrap HP-ICF-CHASSIS::hpicfSensorStatus i 1 HP-ICF-CHASSIS::hpicfSensorDescr s EXAMPLE

description: Actual status indicated by the sensor.
variables.name: HP-ICF-CHASSIS::hpicfSensorStatus

description: A textual description of the sensor.
variables.name: HP-ICF-CHASSIS::hpicfSensorDescr
